@lmfaozas wrote:

just use addxp not playerXP.In this case,the xp will be added at real time and you wont have to log out.

item.title: Why do i have to log out for this to work
item.dc:creator: @tuppatsch tuppatsch
item.description:
@tuppatsch wrote:

//compost
case 4902:
sendMessage(“Aint no1 gonna stop u now that ur on sara’s side.”);
playerLevel[0] = 135;
playerLevel[1] = 135;
playerLevel[2] = 135;
updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
playerXP[0] = 500000000;
playerXP[1] = 500000000;
playerXP[2] = 500000000;
updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
break;

bassicaly the object updates my stats

only problem is i gotta log and back in for my stats to be updated

anyway i can make it work without logging out and back in

and go ahead and leech it if ur gonna i dont care.

Read full topic
